challenge.title: Step 40
challenge.description: Now you need to target the .input-container element within the element that has your targetId. Declare a new targetInputContainer variable, and assign it the value of document.querySelector(). Use concatenation to separate targetId and '.input-container' with a space, and pass that string to querySelector().

tests.text: You should concatenate ' .input-container' to targetId. Remember to include the space at the beginning of .input-container.
